message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your offer, but $60 is too low for me. Could you do $180?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
